https://tmrev.io/movie/750400-C'roh Is Our Name 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c4D7xTTYqqiZoUC2LXG8rjzz1gx.jpg The Pangcah people living in the urban area used to compete and win the dragon boat race every year, but only as hired agents in a festival event of the Han Taiwanese. In 1995, a team of Pangcah contestants decided to compete in the race under the names of their community and homeland, 'C'roh of Yuli, Hualien', striving for glory to honour their true origin. C'roh Is Our Name
